oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bint Al-Nil Starts its Activities
اتحاد بنت النيل يبدأ نشاطه
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Shafik, Doria
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The article features details about the visit of Begum Liaquat Ali Khan to the headquarters of Bint Al Nil, where she was received by Dr. Doria Shafiq. The article also covers a press conference held by the journal on that occasion.
تتحدث هذه المقالة عن زيارة البيجم لياقت علي خان لمقر (بنت النيل) حيث كانت الدكتورة درية شفيق في استقبالها. كما تتناول المقالة المؤتمر الصحفي الذي أقامته (بنت النيل) بالتفصيل.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Women's rights -- Egypt; Women -- Arab countries -- Periodicals
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Rare Books and Special Collections Library; The American University in Cairo
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Women and Memory Forum are copyright holders of the Bint al-Nil Journal Collection.
